alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Holt (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 11:13PM CDT until June 08 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Doniphan County in northeastern Kansas... South central Atchison County in northwestern Missouri... Holt County in northwestern Missouri... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1113 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Craig, or 11 miles northeast of Falls City, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mound City, Highland, Oregon, Fairfax, Forest City, Craig, White Cloud, Big Lake, Leona, Fortescue, Bigelow, Corning, Iowa Point and Fanning. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 67 and 103. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
